Reference

All functions

acs-class

AC outputs: acs objects

acs()

AC* algorithms

acs_setup_detection_containers()

AC* set up: define detection containers

acs_setup_detection_kernels()

AC* set up: define detection kernels

acs_setup_detection_overlaps()

AC* set up: define detection container overlaps

acs_setup_detection_pr()

AC* set up: calculate detection probability around a receiver

acs_setup_obs()

AC* set up: set up movement datasets

cl_lapply() cl_check() cl_cores() cl_chunks() cl_export() cl_stop()

Parallelisation helpers

dat_acoustics

Dataset: passive acoustic telemetry detections

dat_archival

Dataset: archival time series

dat_gebco()

Dataset: a bathymetry dataset

dat_moorings

Dataset: passive acoustic telemetry moorings

dc()

DC: the depth-contour algorithm

dc_setup_model()

DC: a template DC model

get_hr_prop() get_hr_core() get_hr_home() get_hr_full()

Get animal 'home ranges'

make_matrix_receivers()

Matricise receiver deployment time series

normalise()

Normalise a SpatRaster

pf-class

PF outputs: pf objects

pf_backward()

PF: run the backward pass

pf_forward()

PF: run the forward simulation

pf_kick_step() pf_kick_angle() pf_kick()

PF: template movement models

pf_path()

PF: path reconstruction

pf_path_pivot()

PF: pivot path matrices

pf_pou()

PF: map probability-of-use

pf_setup_record()

PF set up: list files from AC* for PF
